languages.text: {n}Ее размышления прерывает шипение Мастера дисциплины. Тихо процедив ругательство, Иокаста плюет в сторону дымящихся останков Адальберта. Ее левая рука висит плетью, а лицо иссечено осколками.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, есть пленный". {n}Она указывает оружием на корчащегося от боли послушника.{/n} "Разрешите добить падаль".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ее размышления прерывает шипение Мастера дисциплины. Тихо процедив ругательство, Иокаста плюет в сторону дымящихся останков Адальберта. Ее левая рука висит плетью, а лицо иссечено осколками.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, есть пленный". {n}Она указывает оружием на корчащегося от боли послушника.{/n} "Разрешите добить падаль".

languages.text: {n}Her ruminations are interrupted by a furious hiss. Sauerback snarls a curse through her teeth and spits at Adalbert's smoking remains. Her left arm hangs limp and her face is mangled by shrapnel.{/n} "Lord Captain, we have a prisoner." {n}She points her weapon at the man standing hunched over in pain.{/n} "Permission to finish off the cur."
languages.original_text: {n}Ее размышления прерывает шипение Мастера дисциплины. Тихо процедив ругательство, Иокаста плюет в сторону дымящихся останков Адальберта. Ее левая рука висит плетью, а лицо иссечено осколками.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, есть пленный". {n}Она указывает оружием на корчащегося от боли послушника.{/n} "Разрешите добить падаль".

traits.locale_text: {n}Her ruminations are interrupted by a furious hiss. Sauerback snarls a curse through her teeth and spits at Adalbert's smoking remains. Her left arm hangs limp and her face is mangled by shrapnel.{/n} "Lord Captain, we have a prisoner." {n}She points her weapon at the man standing hunched over in pain.{/n} "Permission to finish off the cur."

{n}Her ruminations are interrupted by the shuffling footsteps of the Master-at-Arms. Jocasta spits in the direction of Adalbert's smoking remains and hisses a curse through her teeth. Her left arm is hanging limply and her face is mangled by shrapnel.{/n} "Lord Captain, I see a survivor." {n}She points her weapon at the writhing initiate.{/n} "Permission to finish off the scum."

Her left arm hangs limp and her face is mangled by shrapnel.{/n} "Lord Captain, we have a prisoner." {n}She points her weapon at the man standing hunched over in pain.{/n} "Permission to finish off the cur."

languages.text: {n}Ihr Grübeln wird von einem wütenden Zischen unterbrochen. Sauerback stößt einen Fluch aus und spuckt auf Adalberts rauchende Überreste. Ihr linker Arm hängt schlaff herunter, ihr Gesicht ist von Schrapnellen gezeichnet.{/n} "Lord Captain, wir haben einen Gefangenen. {n}Sie deutet mit ihrer Waffe auf den schmerzgebeugten Mann.{/n} "Erbitte Erlaubnis, ihn töten zu dürfen."
languages.original_text: {n}Her ruminations are interrupted by a furious hiss. Sauerback snarls a curse through her teeth and spits at Adalbert's smoking remains. Her left arm hangs limp and her face is mangled by shrapnel.{/n} "Lord Captain, we have a prisoner." {n}She points her weapon at the man standing hunched over in pain.{/n} "Permission to finish off the cur."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihr Grübeln wird von einem wütenden Zischen unterbrochen. Sauerback stößt einen Fluch aus und spuckt auf Adalberts rauchende Überreste. Ihr linker Arm hängt schlaff herunter, ihr Gesicht ist von Schrapnellen gezeichnet.{/n} "Lord Captain, wir haben einen Gefangenen. {n}Sie deutet mit ihrer Waffe auf den schmerzgebeugten Mann.{/n} "Erbitte Erlaubnis, ihn töten zu dürfen."

languages.text: {n}Su reflexión se ve interrumpida por un siseo rabioso. Sauerback profiere una maldición entre dientes y escupe a los restos de Adalbert. El brazo izquierdo le cuelga inerte a un lado del cuerpo, y tiene el rostro desfigurado por la metralla.{/n} «Lord Capitán, tenemos a un prisionero». {n}Señala con su arma a un hombre encorvado por el dolor.{/n} «¿Permiso para rematar a este perro?».
languages.original_text: {n}Her ruminations are interrupted by a furious hiss. Sauerback snarls a curse through her teeth and spits at Adalbert's smoking remains. Her left arm hangs limp and her face is mangled by shrapnel.{/n} "Lord Captain, we have a prisoner." {n}She points her weapon at the man standing hunched over in pain.{/n} "Permission to finish off the cur."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su reflexión se ve interrumpida por un siseo rabioso. Sauerback profiere una maldición entre dientes y escupe a los restos de Adalbert. El brazo izquierdo le cuelga inerte a un lado del cuerpo, y tiene el rostro desfigurado por la metralla.{/n} «Lord Capitán, tenemos a un prisionero». {n}Señala con su arma a un hombre encorvado por el dolor.{/n} «¿Permiso para rematar a este perro?».

languages.text: {n}彼女の熟考は、激しい唸り声によって中断された。ザウアーバックは歯ぎしりとともにののしりを口にして、アダルバートの煙を上げる亡骸へと唾を吐きかけた。彼女の左腕はだらりと垂れ下がり、顔は榴散弾でズタズタだ。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、囚人を捕まえました」{n}彼女は痛みに耐えかねて背を丸めている男に武器を向ける。{/n}「このクズを仕留める許可を」
languages.original_text: {n}Her ruminations are interrupted by a furious hiss. Sauerback snarls a curse through her teeth and spits at Adalbert's smoking remains. Her left arm hangs limp and her face is mangled by shrapnel.{/n} "Lord Captain, we have a prisoner." {n}She points her weapon at the man standing hunched over in pain.{/n} "Permission to finish off the cur."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の熟考は、激しい唸り声によって中断された。ザウアーバックは歯ぎしりとともにののしりを口にして、アダルバートの煙を上げる亡骸へと唾を吐きかけた。彼女の左腕はだらりと垂れ下がり、顔は榴散弾でズタズタだ。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、囚人を捕まえました」{n}彼女は痛みに耐えかねて背を丸めている男に武器を向ける。{/n}「このクズを仕留める許可を」

languages.text: {n}她的沉思被怒气冲冲的嘶嘶声打断了。苏尔贝克咬牙切齿地咒骂着，朝阿达伯特冒着烟的尸体吐了口唾沫。她的左臂无力地垂在体侧，脸也被弹片刮得血肉模糊。{/n}“舰长大人，我看到还有人活着。”{n}她举起武器，指着那个痛苦地弯着腰的男人。{/n}“请您允许我消灭这个人渣。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her ruminations are interrupted by a furious hiss. Sauerback snarls a curse through her teeth and spits at Adalbert's smoking remains. Her left arm hangs limp and her face is mangled by shrapnel.{/n} "Lord Captain, we have a prisoner." {n}She points her weapon at the man standing hunched over in pain.{/n} "Permission to finish off the cur."

traits.locale_text: {n}她的沉思被怒气冲冲的嘶嘶声打断了。苏尔贝克咬牙切齿地咒骂着，朝阿达伯特冒着烟的尸体吐了口唾沫。她的左臂无力地垂在体侧，脸也被弹片刮得血肉模糊。{/n}“舰长大人，我看到还有人活着。”{n}她举起武器，指着那个痛苦地弯着腰的男人。{/n}“请您允许我消灭这个人渣。”

languages.text: {n}Ses réflexions sont interrompues par un sifflement furieux. Sauerback lâche un juron entre ses dents serrées et crache sur les restes encore fumants d'Adalbert. Son bras gauche pend mollement le long de son flanc et son visage est défiguré par le shrapnel.{/n} « Nous avons un prisonnier, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. {n}Elle tend son arme en direction de l'homme qui se plie de douleur.{/n} Permission d'achever ce bâtard. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her ruminations are interrupted by a furious hiss. Sauerback snarls a curse through her teeth and spits at Adalbert's smoking remains. Her left arm hangs limp and her face is mangled by shrapnel.{/n} "Lord Captain, we have a prisoner." {n}She points her weapon at the man standing hunched over in pain.{/n} "Permission to finish off the cur."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses réflexions sont interrompues par un sifflement furieux. Sauerback lâche un juron entre ses dents serrées et crache sur les restes encore fumants d'Adalbert. Son bras gauche pend mollement le long de son flanc et son visage est défiguré par le shrapnel.{/n} « Nous avons un prisonnier, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. {n}Elle tend son arme en direction de l'homme qui se plie de douleur.{/n} Permission d'achever ce bâtard. »

languages.text: {n}Derin düşünceleri öfkeli bir tıslamayla bölünüyor. Sauerback homurdanarak dişlerinin arasından bir lanet okuyor ve Adalbert'in dumanı tüten cesedine tükürüyor. Sol kolu sakat bir hâlde sallanıyor ve yüzü bir şarapnel nedeniyle zarar görmüş.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, bir tutsağımız var." {n}Silahıyla acıdan iki büklüm olmuş adamı gösteriyor.{/n} "Aşağılık herifin işini bitirmek için izin istiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Her ruminations are interrupted by a furious hiss. Sauerback snarls a curse through her teeth and spits at Adalbert's smoking remains. Her left arm hangs limp and her face is mangled by shrapnel.{/n} "Lord Captain, we have a prisoner." {n}She points her weapon at the man standing hunched over in pain.{/n} "Permission to finish off the cur."
